en_text: For 2 turns, increase ATK by 30% for each Two-Pronged Attack awakening skill on the team

jp_skill.name: 不屈のダイヤモンド
jp_skill.raw_description: 2ターンの間、チーム内の2体攻撃の 覚醒数に応じて攻撃力が上昇。

kr_skill.name: 불굴의 다이아몬드
kr_skill.raw_description: 2턴 동안 팀 내의 2마리 공격의 각성수에 따라 공격력이 상승

na_skill.name: Diamond of Fortitude
na_skill.raw_description: ATK increases by the number of [Two-Pronged Attack] Awoken Skills in team for 2 turns
